Uses of Interface
destiny.core.Screen

  • Packages that use Screen 
    Package Description
    destiny.core  
    destiny.panels  

    • Uses of Screen in destiny.core

      Methods in destiny.core that return Screen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Screen ScreenManager.getCurrentScreen()
      Gets the current screen that is being drawn
      Methods in destiny.core with parameters of type Screen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ScreenManager.addScreen(String key, Screen s)
      Add a Screen to the ScreenManager
      static void ScreenManager.setScreen(String key, Screen s, processing.core.PApplet window)
      Set the screen to the given screen given a screen object and key

    • Uses of Screen in destiny.panels

      Classes in destiny.panels that implement Screen 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BattlePrepScreen
      BattlePrepScreen is where the user can select which revolutionaries they want to use for battle
      class  BattleScreen
      BattleScreen is where the user can battle with their revolutionaries
      class  GachaResultsScreen
      GachaResultsScreen is the panel that handles drawing everything that shows once you draw a character.
      class  GachaScreen
      Gacha Screen is a class that draws everything related to the banner and handles anything related to drawing characters
      class  GalleryScreen
      GalleryScreen is the panel that draws and handles all events related to the character gallery
      class  HomeScreen
      HomeScreen is the screen right after the opening screen
      class  LevelSelectScreen
      LevelSelect screen is where the user select which level to play in.
      class  MainScreen
      MainScreen is the screen where the user can select which game modes to play or determine which aspect of the game they want to explore
      class  OpeningScreen
      This class represents the opening/startup screen for the game
